attributes.action: explain and jutify the fact that non-UK citizens (Commonwealth and Irish Republican nationals) can vote in UK parliamentary elections.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the introduction  of ID cards,it is possible to exclude immigrant foreigners from voting in the UK, as happens on other countries. Please pass this on to friends.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
